results.name: Difference between arithmetic derivative (A003415) and its Möbius transform (A300251).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: A003415(n) = {my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From A003415
xref: Cf. A001248 (seems to give the positions of 1's), A006881 (seems to give the positions of 2's).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 08 2018
